idea:
This is a Logistics startup focussing on multi modal transportation, using extensive resources in the Nhava Sheva, Mundra and Hazira port.
I have been directly and indirectly associated to the industry for over a decade now and am implementing the knowledge and resources to develop my own business. With the use of my Masters from New Zealand with specialisation in International Business, I wish to achieve great heights in the Logistics Industry.
name: ARORA FREIGHT MOVERS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

Needs like any planned/unplanned expenses, medical emergency, etc. of our users via our tie-up RBI registered Lending Partners.

Our users/retail borrowers are employees of your tie-up Corporate pool who avail “Credit Facility” for us, to manage there short term cash crunch.
name: ALTRA FINWEALTH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: To carry on the business to own, establish, acquire, run, operate, manage, maintain, develop, promote, administer, either on its own or through fully equipped coaching classes, educational institutes, schools, play schools, colleges, in India or abroad for PROVIDING all types and kinds of EDUCATIONAL services including but not limited to training, coaching, teaching, tutoring, guiding, lecturing students and persons of all ages and studying under all present and future curriculums, syllabus, education boards, education institutes, training institutes, Schools, Colleges, Technical Institutions, Educational Organisations in India and abroad and to set up Coaching Classes and Centres.

idea: UStraww is India’s first ever Eco-Friendly Luxurious Drinking Straw that aims to eliminate the consumption of Plastic Straws and Soggy Paper Straws. We aim to provide the straws that are edible and chemical-free. It is one of a kind in India.
name: UStraww

name: LMAS

idea:
Islesys (Isle or Inclusive Strategic Logistics Ecosystem) was found in 2014 by Dipesh Bhoir, a computer programmer as a side-project inspired by Chinese-miracle trying to build homegrown lean identity-centric services.

Moto: Heresy before self.


Once in a lifetime, we get confident enough to create a dent in the universe. We wanted to be in a position to ask, did ours benefit you?


After years of research and asking,

what does India really needs that we are passionate about?

We created a platform called Aimtera.


What is Aimtera Technology?

Aimtera is an online service for influence networking that operates via websites and mobile apps. The platform is utilized by millennials to establish business connections.

Moto: Thrive Together!


Aimtera gives you the power to monetize your profession.

It helps researchers and entrepreneurs better reach the market.


Within few clicks, you could

- crowdfund any legal campaign.

- Book a Call, Meet, and Dine.

- Order recorded personal video wishes.

- Order recorded business video collaboration.
- Order recorded marketing video promotion.

- Sponsor influencers daily, weekly, and monthly.


The service is highly scalable and made for everyone from professionals to governments.
name: Islesys

idea:
Shreevali Agro (a technology driven Agro company). Our core competency is agro produce from India's western coastal belt of Konkan. Premium Alphonso Mangoes is our key focus.

We have indigenously developed food traceability technology called GoldChain (using RFID and QR code) to ensure guarantee of purity!
name: Shreevali Agro

idea: Quickinvoice is a state of the art software as a service product which provides businesses of all scales, freelancers and other service providers an easy and hassle free method of keeping track of all billing and accounting related data. Quickinvoice is helpful for every business or person who is providing any services or products and is required to issue bills, comply with tax requirement, track sales and GST, understand sale trends, prepare and analyze reports and maintain accounts. The current market requirements for a robust accounting and invoicing software is vast and the available options are either too expensive or too complex for effective use, which led us to develop this product in order to achieve the objective of providing a one stop solution for invoicing and accounting needs for our users. To make available the latest technology and at a reasonable cost we have prepared Quick Invoice which is not just easy for book keeping but also easy on the pocket.
name: SNOOP TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
